Name: In
Description: Allows you to compare a value to a list of values analogous to the 'In' statement in sql. This makes for a very friendly syntax that is (IMHO) superior to a list of 'or' clauses. Instead of : if (s=="John" || s=="Peter" or s=="Paul") one can write if (s.In("John","Paul","Peter"))
Author: C.F. Meijers
